name: ResoNADE
description:
ResoNADE is a 2D top-down 1v1 PvP / bumper-car game where players fight each other to the death in the arena. The controls are designed to be played by 2 friends on a single keyboard.

The year is 2050. Armor has evolved to the point where it's virtually impregnable by any material. In a testing lab, scientists test the theory of causing damage to tanks by sound-powered grenades that transmits sound waves at their natural frequency (i.e. resonance), causing internal motors to vibrate enough to damage the engine.

This game was made in 48 hours as an entry for Global Game Jam 2018 Singapore.
